data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Ngrams are a very important part of Natural Language Processing.
    This module provides an easy way to extract them from text, along
    with their frequency.

    As a plus, you can chose how to extract ngrams: whether to preserve
    punctuation or not, whether you want ngrams with spaces or not, etc.

    This module is currently being used (at least) by Lingua::Identify.
